data.name: Bartender VR Simulator
data.detailed_description:
‚¨áÔ∏èüîΩ‚¨áÔ∏è ‚≠êÔ∏è üß® NEW RELEASE üß® ‚≠êÔ∏è ‚¨áÔ∏èüîΩ‚¨áÔ∏è

Come get some!~

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1418430/Horror_Bar_VR/


About the Game

üç∏ FEATURES üç∏

üßä Full immerse bartender experience - we will literally learn how to make real drinks!
üßä 3 Game Modes.
üßä Non-linear path to finish the level.
üßä 16 legendary and classic drinks to learn.
üßä Seated gameplay - no risk of motion sickness.
üßä Your master and teacher will be Tomasz Ma≈Çek - six-time Bartending World Champion.
üßä Start small in a music club and then climb the ladder until you reach exclusive bars.


üç∏ SUMMARY üç∏
üßäWorking in four unique and professionally equipped virtual bars, you will experience the thrill of the art of bartending under the watchful eye of Tomasz Ma≈Çek, a six-time Bartending World Champion. Begin your journey in a music club and learn how to make four basic drinks. Prove yourself and win the opportunity to train and work in the next location. Master more and more demanding drinks as you progress to new, unique bars. Earn the course completion certificate and take up a whole new challenge in the Pro Mode.

üßäA range of drinking glasses to chose from, different liquors, beverages and additions. Crushed or cubed ice? Professional bartending know-how. Various bartending techniques. Real-life liquid physics and item destruction. Juggling with bartending equipment and drink ingredients. We serve it all in a super-realistic quality.

üßäWho will earn most money in each bar? Who will make a perfect drink in the shortest time? Who will earn the biggest tip for a single drink by mesmerizing the customers by using the flair technique? Today you are in the top 10, tomorrow you drop outside the top 100. Everyday someone quicker than you takes your place. Don‚Äôt let them get ahead of you!

data.short_description: üç∏ Bartender VR Simulator offers you a unique combination of a simulator, bartending course and incredible immersive VR game. Developed in cooperation with a six-time Bartending World Champion, Tomek Malek,

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: CPU: Intel i5-4590 equivalent or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 970
  • Storage: 2000 MB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • Additional Notes: VR ONLY!
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: CPU: Intel i7 equivalent or better
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1080
  • Storage: 2000 MB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • Additional Notes: VR ONLY!
